name: APY.vision
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: APY.vision is a tool to help liquidity providers with analytics. The VISION tokens unlocks pro access to the Vision suite of tools.
